episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a range of intriguing topics, including the ownership of the UFC by the UAE, a new law in Palau requiring all hotels to be five-star, the availability of free portraits of the Queen for Canadian citizens, and the classification of humans in the first edition of the Encyclopedia Britannica.

facts.fact: 10% of the UFC is owned by the UAE.
Palau is about to pass a law, meaning that every hotel in the country has to be five star.
Every Canadian citizen is entitled to a free government issue portrait of the Queen.
The first ever Encyclopedia Britannica said that humans were divided into five categories: American, European, Asian, African, and monstrous.
